title: LG Velvet gets Android 12 w/ new privacy features, no sign of Material You updates
content:
While LG is done with smartphones, the company is fulfilling its promise of still supporting existing models. This week, the LG Velvet is getting its Android 12 update.

moreâ€¦

The post LG Velvet gets Android 12 w/ new privacy features, no sign of Material You updates appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The LG Velvet is getting its Android 12 update now, starting in South Korea, with a few new features but not much more.
